haikus.title: Supernormal
haikus.poem:
Starting to feel me
Normal but with added good
Ready to spin now

haikus.title: Honey
haikus.poem:
Buzzing thoughts and fears
Swarm around my head like bees
I hope there's honey

haikus.title: Tipping over
haikus.poem:
Cold nip in the air
Mornings are growing darker
The year tips over

haikus.title: Early morning
haikus.poem:
Up far too early
Writing poetry at dawn
Bird song woke me up

haikus.title: What we love about skillful haiku poetry
haikus.poem:
What we love about
Skillful haiku poetry:
Soulful brevity.

haikus.title: Swallows flown away
haikus.poem:
Can silence echo?
The weight of absence heavy
Swallows flown away

haikus.title: Train haiku
haikus.poem:
Chattering classes
Young girls putting on makeup
Commuting to work

haikus.title: Heliotropic
haikus.poem:
Here on the platform
We turn to the rising sun
Heliotropic

haikus.title: Morning haiku
haikus.link:
Free coffee refills
Side of hot buttery toast
Bless the Waffle Barn

haikus.title: Haiku for home
haikus.link:
The bird sings loudly
He can see the clear blue sky
Through the birdcage bars

haikus.title: The Old Box
haikus.link:
IÂ held the old box
But didn't open it - yet
Ignorance is bliss

haikus.title: Memories of love
haikus.poem:
Memories of love
Released at last from darkness
Amazed us all

haikus.title: Haiku
haikus.link:
A beautiful dress
Like blossom on cherry boughs
Whispering of spring

haikus.title: Apple Haiku
haikus.link:
Apples, swollen, red,
Twisting in the wind, waiting
For Fall, and falling.

haikus.title: Blue Cornish Morning
haikus.link:
Blue Cornish morning
Bright sun mirrored in the sea
It's Summer's last shout

haikus.title: On walking through Princes Street Gardens
haikus.link:
A scatter of leaves,
Vermillion and yellow:
The year's bright decline.

haikus.title: Now winter you say?
haikus.link:
Now winter you say?
Then why do bulbs push up hard
In January?

haikus.title: The slivered old moon
haikus.link:
The slivered old moon
Like a splinter from my heart
Almost worn away
